Provides.description: Modules that should be provided as shared modules to the share unlock. When provided, property name is used to match modules, otherwise this is automatically inferred from share key.

items.description: Modules that should be provided as shared modules to the share unlock.

ProvidesConfig.description: Advanced configuration for modules that should be provided as shared modules to the share unlock.

eager.description: Include the provided module directly instead behind an async request. This allows to use this shared module in initial load too. All possible shared modules need to be eager too.

shareKey.description: Key in the share unlock under which the shared modules should be stored.

version.description: Version of the provided module. Will replace lower matching versions, but not higher.

anyOf.description: Version as string. Each part of the version should be separated by a dot '.'.

ProvidesItem.description: Request to a module that should be provided as shared module to the share unlock (will be resolved when relative).

ProvidesObject.description: Modules that should be provided as shared modules to the share unlock. Property names are used as share keys.

additionalProperties.description: Modules that should be provided as shared modules to the share unlock.

shareunlock.description: Share unlock name used for all provided modules (defaults to 'default').
